output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
#load data file

ces <- read_csv(here('data','ces3demographics.csv')) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
# create scatterplot 
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "Percentage White in Census Tract",
       y = "CalEnviroScreen Pollution Burden Score",
       caption = "The relationship between the percentage of white population from the 2010 census and the aggregate CalEnviroScreen 3.0 score in CA.") +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "forestgreen", high = "firebrick") +
  theme_minimal()
```
